gen:link.msg:message: De datum gerapporteerd voor `DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearStartDate` MOET liggen voor de datum gerapporteerd voor `DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearEndDate`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearStartDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearStartDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReasonsForExceedingMaximumAmountOfRemuneration` MOET minimaal één keer voorkomen, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration` groter is dan 0. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
